items.name: Kaleidoscope
items.desc:
12x 440ml cans of 4.2% Pale Ale.
Kaleidoscope combines three different hops to create a seasonally evolving flavour profile. Whilst the hops may change, our intention remains the same - to create a beer that is harmonious, bright and refreshing.
Suitable for vegans.
We’re offering a 10% discount for all NHS staff. Please check out using your NHS email address and the code ‘NHS10’.
Please note that we can only deliver to the UK mainland, excluding Northern and Mainland Ireland, Guernsey and Jersey.
Please take care to select the correct shipping option when checking out. Free Bristol delivery takes 1 - 2 working days and applies to the following postcodes: BS1, BS2, BS3, BS4, BS5, BS6, BS7, BS8, BS9, BS10, BS13, BS14, BS15, BS16, BS32, BS34, BS35, BS36 and BS37. Within BS8, free delivery includes BS8 1, BS8 2 and BS8 4. Please only select the option for free Bristol delivery to these postcodes; otherwise we will have to refund your order and you’ll need to order again using nationwide delivery, since we use a separate courier service for nationwide drop-offs.
Nationwide delivery takes 2-3 working days.

items.name: Milk Shake
items.desc:
12x 330ml cans of 5.6% Milk Stout.
Milk Shake is brewed with sugar from cow’s milk to give the beer a sweet, creamy tone. The beer combines copious chocolate malts laced with vanilla and cacao to create a luxurious, milkshake-rich and satisfyingly dark beer.

items.name: Mixed
items.desc:
6 x 440ml cans of Kaleidoscope 4.2% Pale Ale, 6 x 440ml cans of 5.6% Sundance India Pale Ale.
You asked, we listened. We’re delighted to present our first mixed case of Wiper and True beers. Two of our most popular beers in one delectable case.
Bursting with juicy tropical fruit flavours such as mango, pineapple and papaya and layered with berry and citrus notes, Sundance combines the finest US and UK hops to create a crisp, complex and highly refreshing IPA.
Kaleidoscope combines three different hops to create a seasonally evolving flavour profile. Whilst the hops may change, our intention remains the same - to create a beer that is harmonious, bright and refreshing.
Both beers are suitable for vegans.

items.name: Small Beer
items.desc:
12x 440ml cans of 2.7% Light Pale Ale.
Small Beer is an exceptionally satisfying and full-bodied beer for its stature, with the same big hop hit you may expect from our more muscular Pale Ales. Small Beer is vibrant with citrus, tropical fruit and hedgerow berry flavours, meandering to a gentle bitter finish.
Suitable for vegans.
